code.displayName: Relevant diagnostic tests and/or laboratory data

td.content: s:a female aged 39 yrs presents with Body Aches for 7 weeks. o:Height 156 cm, Weight 78.7 kg, Temperature 36.5 C, Pulse 67, SystolicBP 107, DiastolicBP 66, Respiration 15 a:Fibromyalgia p:performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed SAVELLA - 50 mg 2x day, and ordered ESR.

s:F editor aged 41 yrs presents with Body Aches for 10 days. she has a history of Fibromyalgia for past 2 years. describes drinking an average of 12 drinks a week for about 3 years in her past she denies ever using cigarettes o:Height 157 cm, Weight 80.7 kg, Temperature 36.7 C, Pulse 95, SystolicBP 114, DiastolicBP 74, Respiration 17 a:Fibromyalgia p:performed E/M Level 2 (established patient) - Completed, and referred patient to rheumatology.

content2.Unmatched: her past she denies ever using cigarettes

Patient is a moderate drinker Patient does not smoke o:Height 157 cm, Weight 81.2 kg, Temperature 36.7 C, Pulse 95, SystolicBP 115, DiastolicBP 76, Respiration 18 a:Fibromyalgia p:performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed SAVELLA - 50 mg 2x day.
